channel.title: Making it save a public int?
channel.description:
Hey, I was wondering how I would make it save a public int?
Like, as soon as you log out it resets whatever the number was to 0.

item.title: Making it save a public int?
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Ok thanks, I’ll look around. If I can’t find it I’ll hit you up.

Read full topic
item.source: Making it save a public int?

item.title: Making it save a public int?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:3, topic:404358”]Loaded and saved between sessions.

It’s their total kills and deaths.[/quote]

Then I’d suggest searching for how to save player variables.

If you can’t find one, I could make a pseudo-code example.

Read full topic
item.source: Making it save a public int?
